sentences.english: Neither Maya tradition nor modern astronomy supports a belief in any such beam.
sentences.chinese: 無論是瑪雅傳統還是現代天文學都不支持這種觀點。

sentences.english: The Aztecs, Maya, And Their Predecessors, 4Th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 阿茲特克人，瑪雅人和他們的前輩，第4版。

sentences.english: Now we have Ashton Kutcher speaking out, citing the Mayan Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 如今我們有艾什頓庫奇站進去發言，援用瑪雅曆法。

sentences.english: The Mayans lived in Central America thousands of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 數千年前，瑪雅人生活在中美洲。

sentences.english: No wonder their name derives from the angry Mayan god of storms and wind: Huracán.
sentences.chinese: 難怪它們的名字是從瑪雅的風暴和雨神名字衍生而來。

sentences.english: Mayan language spoken by the Kekchi people.
sentences.chinese: 凱克奇人民所說的一種瑪雅語言。

sentences.english: Also, in the Mayan tradition the number Nine plays a predominating role.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在傳統的瑪雅數字九統領作用的發揮。

sentences.english: 'The Mayans saw this coming thousands of years ago,' says one character.
sentences.chinese: 一位角色說，瑪雅人在幾千年前就看到了這點。

sentences.english: The Mayas do not just disappeared, they were evacuated by spaceships and flew away.
sentences.chinese: 瑪雅人並非突然消失了，而是搭乘宇宙飛船撤走了。

sentences.english: But the word of the LORD came to Shemaiah the man of God, saying.
sentences.chinese: 但耶和華的話臨到神人示瑪雅說。

sentences.english: Of the sons of Elizaphan; Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred
sentences.chinese: 以利撒反子孫中有族長示瑪雅和他的弟兄二百人。

sentences.english: One day I went to the house of Shemaiah son of Delaiah, the son of Mehetabel, who was shut in at his home.
sentences.chinese: 我到了米希大別的孫子，第來雅的兒子示瑪雅家裏。

sentences.english: Around A. D. 600, the Mayas were the main aboriginal group in Central America.
sentences.chinese: 公元600年左右，瑪雅人是中美洲主要的土著居民。

sentences.english: The Mayas believed that chocolate had mystical properties but cocoa also had commercial value.
sentences.chinese: 瑪雅人相信巧克力具有神祕的特性，也具有商業價值。

sentences.english: By uncovering the Mayan codes, Arguelles discovered the telepathic nature of time.
sentences.chinese: 由發現瑪雅守則，列斯發現了心靈感應性質時間。

sentences.english: I fell for the hype on the dust jacket and the Mayan type artwork within.
sentences.chinese: 我摔倒在宣傳上的防塵套和瑪雅文化的類型作品內。

definition: El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
Cristóbal Colón or Christopher Columbus (1451-1506)/Columbus, capital of Ohio
Moore or Moor (name)/see also 摩爾人|摩尔人[Mo2 er3 ren2]
